reviews.review_text:
Visited here last week. Really good place, just on the way to Baga beach! The vibe of the place is amazing. They have live music on weekends which elevates the vibe. They have an indoor as well as an outdoor seating.

The cocktails & food are excellent and totally worth the price. A must visit, especially over weekends!

It's a really well set up restaurant located just next to the busy lanes of North Goa and has a beautiful ambience. They offer spacious ambience overlooking beautiful fields, delicious oriental food, cocktails, live music and much more

We tried their special bloody Mary prawns for starters and we totally loved the unique flavours it had. Next we had their Vietnamese chilli fish and I loved every bite of it. The chonak fish was fresh and flavourful.
We also tried their Indonesian fried rice which was sweet, tangy. The chicken steak had tender chicken pieces tossed in flavourful sauce.
For drinks we had fresh orange juice, pineapple juice and lemon soda. It was really chilled and refreshing
For deserts, I had chocolate ice cream. Beautifully served and tasted heavenly.

They also have a live bar serving unique cocktails and mocktails and their ambience spanning over 3 floors is perfect for parties!!

The food was presented beautifully and the quantity was really good. The staff were welcoming and friendly. A must try place for weekend getaways in north goa!!

It was a lovely experience!!!
the food is very tasty and staff are very friendly.
They also do candlelight dinners on advance bookings.

Its a great place if you want to host birthday parties as they curate the menu as per your liking and very flexible.
Me and my friends had a great time..!!
